verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARGM-TMP: on May 31] [ARG1: that he may pardon former Illinois Governor Rod Blagojevich and author , entrepreneur , and cooking show superstar Martha Stewart] .
President Donald Trump told reporters on May 31 that he [V: may] pardon former Illinois Governor Rod Blagojevich and author , entrepreneur , and cooking show superstar Martha Stewart .
